Author: Nexai
Name: FCCH
Description: Free Company Chest Helper. Automate deposits, withdrawals, and organization. Manage crystals, custom lists, and workshop projects.
Punchline: You ain't savin these slots, you puttin em to work.
Changelog:
- Crystal management: Dedicated tab, deposit/withdraw with keep amounts
- Gil deposit/withdraw commands (gd/gw with k/m/all support)
- Organizer: Move and Sort items between FC chest tabs
- Refactored codebase structure

Author: Nexai
Name: Memba
Punchline: Memba?! I memba when we had RAM.
Description:
FFXIV Memory Manager. Download more RAM!

 ⚠️This plugin is designed for multiboxers (4+ clients) running idle routines such as retainers and submarines. More aggressive and meaningful culling is planned for future releases. Do not install this if you are playing normally. It grants no lasting performance benefit for a single active client.
